alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Montour; Northumberland; Schuylkill (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 5:59PM EDT until July 27 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... Montour County in central Pennsylvania... Central Northumberland County in central Pennsylvania... North central Schuylkill County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from East Berwick to Buckhorn to Jerseytown to Milton, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bloomsburg, Berwick, Mount Carmel, Danville, Mcadoo, Elysburg, Riverside, Catawissa, Mifflinville, Lightstreet, Almedia and Oneida. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
